text.0: to soma who is purified as ordering priest the song is raised.
text.1: bring meed as twere to one who makes thee glad with hymns.
text.2: blended with milk and curds he flows on through the long wool of the sheep.
text.3: the goldhued purified makes him three seats for rest.
text.4: on through the long wool of the sheep to the meathdropping vat he flows.
text.5: the Ṛṣis sevenfold quire hath sung aloud to him.
text.6: shared by all gods infallible the leader of our holy hymns.
text.7: goldenhued soma being cleansed hath reached the bowls.
text.8: after thy godlike qualities associate with indra go.
text.9: as a priest purified by priests immortal one.
text.10: like a carhorse who shows his strength a god effused for deities.
